New York faces a trio of health concerns with a new flu mutation, while Mayor-elect Mamdani prepares for a swift transition to City Hall, addressing issues like NYPD surveillance and affordable housing amidst rising political challenges and community advocacy.

### Risks & Alerts

- Experts warn of trio of illnesses and a new flu mutation affecting New York residents. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Thanksgiving weather forecast indicates potential travel disruptions; check conditions before heading out. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Asian dessert buns recalled from stores across New York due to safety concerns. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
